alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:40PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact Bagdad and surrounding locations in Yavapai County through 115 PM MST... At 1238 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bagdad, or 27 miles east of Wikieup, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding can occur. Locations impacted include... Bagdad. This includes the following highways... State Route 97 between mile markers 165 and 166. Highway 93 near mile marker 149. State Route 96 between mile markers 0 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
